sourcesContent:
import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react' import PreviewNav from '../components/Previewnavbar'; import Files from './Files'; import { BrowserRouter as Router, Route, Switch } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Link as Link2 } from 'react-scroll'; import Previewdetails from './Previewdetails'; import axios from 'axios'; import { Baseurl } from '../components/Baseurl.js'; const Preview = () => { useEffect(() => { let courseCode = JSON.parse(localStorage.code) axios.post(`${Baseurl}coursedetails.php`, JSON.stringify(courseCode) ).then(res => { if (res.status == 200) { let CourseResponse = res.data.CourseDetails; setCourseDetails(CourseResponse); localStorage.setItem('courseId', JSON.stringify(CourseResponse.course_id)) } }) }, []) const [courseDetails, setCourseDetails] = useState({}) return (

{courseDetails.title}

) } export default Preview
